criteria.criterion: Comparison table faithfully reproduces the Figma layout with 5 plan columns and 7 feature rows
criteria.evidence: Screenshot and accessibility tree confirm 5 plan columns (Flex consumption, Consumption, Container Apps environment, Functions Premium, App Service) and 7 feature rows (Serverless, Dedicated compute, Virtual networking, Prevent cold starts, Max scale out, Max function execution time, Azure OpenAI integration). Layout matches Figma reference.

criteria.criterion: Each plan column has a radio button for selection with Flex consumption selected by default
criteria.evidence: Accessibility tree shows CuiRadioGroup with CuiRadio in each column header. Default state is 'flex-consumption' with blue border highlight. Clicking any column selects that plan.

criteria.criterion: Feature rows are expandable/collapsible — showing summary value by default and a 2-3 sentence explanation on click
criteria.evidence: Clicked 'Serverless' button — row expanded showing 2-3 sentence explanation per plan. aria-expanded attribute toggles correctly. Keyboard accessible (Enter/Space). All 7 rows support expand/collapse with educational per-plan explanations.

criteria.criterion: Expand/collapse uses a chevron icon indicator with smooth animation
criteria.evidence: CuiIcon name='chevron-right' with CSS transition: transform 0.2s ease. Rotates 90deg when expanded via .fchp-expanded class.

criteria.criterion: Footer bar with Select button is docked to the bottom of the page
criteria.evidence: Screenshot shows 'Select' primary button at bottom. CSS uses flex column layout with flex-shrink: 0 on footer bar, border-top separator, and neutral-background1.

criteria.criterion: Plan descriptions and feature values match the Figma design exactly
criteria.evidence: All 5 plan names and descriptions match Figma. Feature values verified: Serverless (✓,✓,✓,-,-), Dedicated compute (-,-,✓,✓,✓), Virtual networking (✓,-,✓,✓,✓), Prevent cold starts (Optional,-,Optional,Included,Included), Max scale out (1000,200,300,100,40-60), Max function execution time (Unlimited,10 minutes,Unlimited,Unlimited,Unlimited), Azure OpenAI (✓,-,-,-,-).

criteria.criterion: Uses Coherence design tokens for all colors, typography, spacing, and borders
criteria.evidence: After audit fix: all font sizes use --font-size-base* tokens, checkmark uses --success-foreground1, borders use --neutral-stroke2, backgrounds use --neutral-background*, foregrounds use --neutral-foreground*. No hardcoded values remain.
criteria.feedback: 4 violations found and fixed during custom code audit: success token name (hyphen), plan-name specificity, label overflow, explanation font size.

details: Token --success-foreground-1 → --success-foreground1 (resolved to black instead of green)
.fchp-plan-name specificity lost to .fchp-table th → fixed with .fchp-table .fchp-plan-name
white-space: nowrap on feature labels caused 'Max function execution time' overflow → removed
Explanation row font-size: base100 (10px) too small → changed to base200 (12px)
